name: The Ultimate Judgement of The Savage Sheep
name_original: The Ultimate Judgement of The Savage Sheep
description:
The Ultimate Judgement Of The Savage Sheep (That leads to a huge carnage) was made during the GMTK 2020 Game Jam by a group of French game development students.

Shawn the Sheep wakes up in a dark room infested with evil humanoid-ish monsters. It is time for him and his huge shotgun to give his judgement after all those years of captive sheephood.

CONTROLS

Move : Z,Q,S,D for AZERTY

Shoot : Left Click

Pause : Escape
